page.title: 03SUTTONS SEEDS FACTORY
page.content: On the 7th of June, the third year class went to{SUTTONS SEEDS.}We set off at ten o'clock to get there at half past.There are two{Suttons Seeds} buildings but they are not far apart so it was only a quick walk to each building.In he lab. there were small house shaped boxes which were see through.They put seeds in them and when they grow to the top of the box they take the lid off.They get a certain kind of paper and to get the seeds on quicker they use a small hover and shake on a hundred seeds to go on the holes.They then take off the spare seeds and press the hover down onto the paper.This releases the seeds so they are nicely set out.Once we had seen everything in that building we walked down to the main factory where all the packing was done.We enjoyed our visit very much.
